è¿”å›ä¸€ä¸ªå‘é‡æ•°ç»„ï¼Œè¡¨ç¤ºæ˜ å°„åˆ° :ref:`XROrigin3D<class_XROrigin3D>` ç‚¹å‘¨å›´çš„è™šæ‹Ÿç©ºé—´çš„ç‰©ç†æ¸¸ç©åŒºåŸŸã€‚è¿™äº›ç‚¹å½¢æˆä¸€ä¸ªå‡¸å¤šè¾¹å½¢ï¼Œå¯è¢«ç”¨äºå¯¹æ¸¸ç©åŒºåŸŸåšå‡ºååº”æˆ–å¯è§†åŒ–ã€‚å¦‚æœè¯¥åŠŸèƒ½ä¸å—æ”¯æŒæˆ–ä¿¡æ¯å°šä¸å¯ç”¨ï¼Œåˆ™è¿”å›ä¸€ä¸ªç©ºæ•°ç»„ã€‚

.. _class_XRInterface_method_initialize:

.. rst-class:: classref-method

:ref:`bool<class_bool>` **initialize**\ (\ ) :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_XRInterface_method_initialize>`

è°ƒç”¨å®ƒæ¥åˆå§‹åŒ–è¿™ä¸ªæ¥å£ã€‚è¢«åˆå§‹åŒ–çš„ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªæ¥å£è¢«è¯†åˆ«ä¸ºä¸»æ¥å£ï¼Œå®ƒå°†ç”¨äºæ¸²æŸ“è¾“å‡ºã€‚

åˆå§‹åŒ–æƒ³è¦ä½¿ç”¨çš„æ¥å£åï¼Œéœ€è¦å¯ç”¨è§†å£çš„ AR/VR æ¨¡å¼ï¼Œå¹¶ä¸”æ¸²æŸ“åº”è¯¥å¼€å§‹ã€‚

\ **æ³¨æ„ï¼š**\ å¯¹äºä»»ä½•ä½¿ç”¨ Godot ä¸»è¾“å‡ºçš„è®¾å¤‡ï¼Œä¾‹å¦‚ç§»åŠ¨ VRï¼Œå¿…é¡»åœ¨ä¸»è§†å£ä¸Šå¯ç”¨ XR æ¨¡å¼ã€‚

å¦‚æœä¸ºå¤„ç†è‡ªå·±è¾“å‡ºçš„å¹³å°ï¼ˆä¾‹å¦‚ OpenVRï¼‰æ‰§è¡Œè¯¥æ“ä½œï¼Œåˆ™ Godot å°†åªæ˜¾ç¤ºä¸€åªçœ¼ç›è€Œä¸ä¼šåœ¨å±å¹•ä¸Šå¤±çœŸã€‚æˆ–è€…ï¼Œå¯ä»¥å°†å•ç‹¬çš„è§†å£èŠ‚ç‚¹æ·»åŠ åˆ°åœºæ™¯å¹¶åœ¨è¯¥è§†å£ä¸Šå¯ç”¨ AR/VRã€‚å®ƒå°†è¢«ç”¨äºè¾“å‡ºåˆ° HMDï¼Œè®©ä½ å¯ä»¥åœ¨ä¸»çª—å£ä¸­è‡ªç”±åœ°åšä»»ä½•ä½ å–œæ¬¢çš„äº‹æƒ…ï¼Œä¾‹å¦‚ä½¿ç”¨å•ç‹¬çš„ç›¸æœºä½œä¸ºæ—è§‚è€…ç›¸æœºæˆ–æ¸²æŸ“å®Œå…¨ä¸åŒçš„ä¸œè¥¿ã€‚

è™½ç„¶å½“å‰æœªä½¿ç”¨ï¼Œä½†å¯ä»¥æ¿€æ´»å…¶ä»–æ¥å£ã€‚å¦‚æœæƒ³è·Ÿè¸ªæ¥è‡ªå…¶ä»–å¹³å°çš„æ§åˆ¶å™¨ï¼Œå¯èƒ½ä¼šå¸Œæœ›è¿™æ ·åšã€‚ä½†æ˜¯ï¼Œæ­¤æ—¶åªæœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªæ¥å£å¯ä»¥æ¸²æŸ“åˆ° HMDã€‚

**å·²å¼ƒç”¨ï¼š** Check if :ref:`environment_blend_mode<class_XRInterface_property_environment_blend_mode>` is :ref:`XR_ENV_BLEND_MODE_ALPHA_BLEND<class_XRInterface_constant_XR_ENV_BLEND_MODE_ALPHA_BLEND>`, instead.

**å·²å¼ƒç”¨ï¼š** Check that :ref:`XR_ENV_BLEND_MODE_ALPHA_BLEND<class_XRInterface_constant_XR_ENV_BLEND_MODE_ALPHA_BLEND>` is supported using :ref:`get_supported_environment_blend_modes<class_XRInterface_method_get_supported_environment_blend_modes>`, instead.

å¦‚æœè¯¥æ¥å£æ”¯æŒç©¿é€ï¼Œåˆ™è¿”å› ``true``\ ã€‚

.. rst-class:: classref-item-separator

.. _class_XRInterface_method_set_environment_blend_mode:

.. rst-class:: classref-method

:ref:`bool<class_bool>` **set_environment_blend_mode**\ (\ mode\: :ref:`EnvironmentBlendMode<enum_XRInterface_EnvironmentBlendMode>`\ ) :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_XRInterface_method_set_environment_blend_mode>`

è®¾ç½®æ´»åŠ¨çš„ç¯å¢ƒæ··åˆæ¨¡å¼ã€‚

\ ``mode`` æ˜¯ä»ä¸‹ä¸€å¸§å¼€å§‹çš„ç¯å¢ƒæ··åˆæ¨¡å¼ã€‚

\ **æ³¨æ„ï¼š**\ å¹¶éæ‰€æœ‰è¿è¡Œæ—¶éƒ½æ”¯æŒå…¨éƒ¨çš„ç¯å¢ƒæ··åˆæ¨¡å¼ï¼Œå› æ­¤åœ¨å¯åŠ¨æ—¶æ£€æŸ¥è¿™ä¸€ç‚¹å¾ˆé‡è¦ã€‚ä¾‹å¦‚ï¼š

::

    func _ready():
        var xr_interface: XRInterface = XRServer.find_interface("OpenXR")
        if xr_interface and xr_interface.is_initialized():
            var vp: Viewport = get_viewport()
            vp.use_xr = true
            var acceptable_modes = [XRInterface.XR_ENV_BLEND_MODE_OPAQUE, XRInterface.XR_ENV_BLEND_MODE_ADDITIVE]
            var modes = xr_interface.get_supported_environment_blend_modes()
            for mode in acceptable_modes:
                if mode in modes:
                    xr_interface.set_environment_blend_mode(mode)
                    break

:ref:`bool<class_bool>` **set_play_area_mode**\ (\ mode\: :ref:`PlayAreaMode<enum_XRInterface_PlayAreaMode>`\ ) :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_XRInterface_method_set_play_area_mode>`

è®¾ç½®æ´»åŠ¨çš„æ¸¸ç©åŒºåŸŸæ¨¡å¼ï¼Œå¦‚æœè¯¥æ¨¡å¼ä¸èƒ½ä¸è¯¥æ¥å£ä¸€èµ·ä½¿ç”¨ï¼Œå°†è¿”å› ``false``\ ã€‚

\ **æ³¨æ„ï¼š**\ åœ¨æ¥å£åˆå§‹åŒ–åæ›´æ”¹è¯¥è®¾ç½®å¯èƒ½ä¼šè®©ç©å®¶æ„Ÿåˆ°ä¸èˆ’æœï¼Œå› æ­¤å»ºè®®ä½¿ç”¨ :ref:`XRServer.center_on_hmd<class_XRServer_method_center_on_hmd>` åœ¨ HMD ä¸Šé‡æ–°å±…ä¸­ï¼ˆå¦‚æœåˆ‡æ¢åˆ° :ref:`XR_PLAY_AREA_STAGE<class_XRInterface_constant_XR_PLAY_AREA_STAGE>`\ ï¼‰æˆ–åœ¨åœºæ™¯æ”¹å˜æ—¶è¿›è¡Œåˆ‡æ¢ã€‚

.. rst-class:: classref-item-separator

.. _class_XRInterface_method_start_passthrough:

.. rst-class:: classref-method

:ref:`bool<class_bool>` **start_passthrough**\ (\ ) :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_XRInterface_method_start_passthrough>`

**å·²å¼ƒç”¨ï¼š** Set the :ref:`environment_blend_mode<class_XRInterface_property_environment_blend_mode>` to :ref:`XR_ENV_BLEND_MODE_ALPHA_BLEND<class_XRInterface_constant_XR_ENV_BLEND_MODE_ALPHA_BLEND>`, instead.

å¯åŠ¨ç©¿é€ï¼Œå¦‚æœæ— æ³•å¯åŠ¨åˆ™ä¼šè¿”å› ``false``\ ã€‚

\ **æ³¨æ„ï¼š**\ XR æ‰€ä½¿ç”¨çš„è§†å£å¿…é¡»æœ‰é€æ˜èƒŒæ™¯ï¼Œå¦åˆ™ç©¿é€å¯èƒ½æ— æ³•æ­£ç¡®æ¸²æŸ“ã€‚

|void| **stop_passthrough**\ (\ ) :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_XRInterface_method_stop_passthrough>`

**å·²å¼ƒç”¨ï¼š** Set the :ref:`environment_blend_mode<class_XRInterface_property_environment_blend_mode>` to :ref:`XR_ENV_BLEND_MODE_OPAQUE<class_XRInterface_constant_XR_ENV_BLEND_MODE_OPAQUE>`, instead.

åœæ­¢ç©¿é€ã€‚

.. _class_XRInterface_method_supports_play_area_mode:

.. rst-class:: classref-method

:ref:`bool<class_bool>` **supports_play_area_mode**\ (\ mode\: :ref:`PlayAreaMode<enum_XRInterface_PlayAreaMode>`\ ) :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_XRInterface_method_supports_play_area_mode>`

è¯·è°ƒç”¨è¿™ä¸ªæ–¹æ³•æ¥æŸ¥è¯¢æ­¤æ¥å£æ˜¯å¦æ”¯æŒç»™å®šçš„æ¸¸ç©åŒºåŸŸæ¨¡å¼ã€‚

.. rst-class:: classref-item-separator

----

.. _class_XRInterface_method_trigger_haptic_pulse:

.. rst-class:: classref-method

|void| **trigger_haptic_pulse**\ (\ action_name\: :ref:`String<class_String>`, tracker_name\: :ref:`StringName<class_StringName>`, frequency\: :ref:`float<class_float>`, amplitude\: :ref:`float<class_float>`, duration_sec\: :ref:`float<class_float>`, delay_sec\: :ref:`float<class_float>`\ ) :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_XRInterface_method_trigger_haptic_pulse>`

Triggers a haptic pulse on a device associated with this interface.

\ ``action_name`` is the name of the action for this pulse.

\ ``tracker_name`` is optional and can be used to direct the pulse to a specific device provided that device is bound to this haptic.

\ ``frequency`` is the frequency of the pulse, set to ``0.0`` to have the system use a default frequency.

\ ``amplitude`` is the amplitude of the pulse between ``0.0`` and ``1.0``.

\ ``duration_sec`` is the duration of the pulse in seconds.

\ ``delay_sec`` is a delay in seconds before the pulse is given.

.. rst-class:: classref-item-separator

----

.. _class_XRInterface_method_uninitialize:

.. rst-class:: classref-method

|void| **uninitialize**\ (\ ) :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_XRInterface_method_uninitialize>`

å…³é—­æ¥å£ã€‚

.. |virtual| replace:: :abbr:`virtual (æœ¬æ–¹æ³•é€šå¸¸éœ€è¦ç”¨æˆ·è¦†ç›–æ‰èƒ½ç”Ÿæ•ˆã€‚)`
.. |const| replace:: :abbr:`const (æœ¬æ–¹æ³•æ— å‰¯ä½œç”¨ï¼Œä¸ä¼šä¿®æ”¹è¯¥å®ä¾‹çš„ä»»ä½•æˆå‘˜å˜é‡ã€‚)`
.. |vararg| replace:: :abbr:`vararg (æœ¬æ–¹æ³•é™¤äº†èƒ½æ¥å—åœ¨æ­¤å¤„æè¿°çš„å‚æ•°å¤–ï¼Œè¿˜èƒ½å¤Ÿç»§ç»­æ¥å—ä»»æ„æ•°é‡çš„å‚æ•°ã€‚)`
.. |constructor| replace:: :abbr:`constructor (æœ¬æ–¹æ³•ç”¨äºæ„é€ æŸä¸ªç±»å‹ã€‚)`
.. |static| replace:: :abbr:`static (è°ƒç”¨æœ¬æ–¹æ³•æ— éœ€å®ä¾‹ï¼Œå¯ç›´æ¥ä½¿ç”¨ç±»åè¿›è¡Œè°ƒç”¨ã€‚)`
.. |operator| replace:: :abbr:`operator (æœ¬æ–¹æ³•æè¿°çš„æ˜¯ä½¿ç”¨æœ¬ç±»å‹ä½œä¸ºå·¦æ“ä½œæ•°çš„æœ‰æ•ˆè¿ç®—ç¬¦ã€‚)`
.. |bitfield| replace:: :abbr:`BitField (è¿™ä¸ªå€¼æ˜¯ç”±ä¸‹åˆ—ä½æ ‡å¿—æ„æˆä½æ©ç çš„æ•´æ•°ã€‚)`
.. |void| replace:: :abbr:`void (æ— è¿”å›å€¼ã€‚)`
